articles.title: Benjamin Hivert
articles.contents:
My Website
          
          
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Benjamin Hivert
          
          
            
              I’m a PhD Student in Biostatistic at the University of Bordeaux. I work in the SISTM from both Inria and Inserm institutes.
              My main research focus are high-dimensional clustering particularly for genomics data
